cnbc.title: CoreWeave's revenue more than doubles as AI buildout expansion accelerates
cnbc.summary: Computing supply CoreWeave expected to receive from an outside data center developer will land in the the first quarter of 2026 instead of the current quarter.

cnbc.title: Government shutdown deal set for final Senate votes Monday night
cnbc.summary: The deal does not include an extension of enhanced ACA tax credits, which had been the key demand by most Democrats since the government shutdown began Oct. 1.

cnbc.title: Paramount Skydance expects another $1B in merger savings as David Ellison resets spending
cnbc.summary: CEO David Ellison outlined further layoffs and synergies in Paramount Skydance's first earnings report since its merger in August.

cnbc.title: American farmers push to boost soybean sales in China as Trump's trade war rumbles on
cnbc.summary: China lifted retaliatory tariffs on some agricultural products after the meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping.

cnbc.title: What Democrats are — and aren't — getting in the deal that could end the government shutdown
cnbc.summary: The pending government funding deal includes a guarantee from Republican leadership that the Senate will soon vote on a Democrat-drafted health care bill.

cnbc.title: Flight disruptions from shutdown pile up as Trump threatens air traffic controllers
cnbc.summary: Flight delays and cancellations piled up in recent days as air traffic controller staffing shortages worsen in the government shutdown.

cnbc.title: Trump backs Senate deal that would end government shutdown
cnbc.summary: Some Democrats are fuming over the Senate government funding deal because it drops a key demand: securing an extension of soon-to-expire Obamacare subsidies.

cnbc.title: Trump proposes 50-year mortgage, but some say homeowner savings would be minimal
cnbc.summary: The intended purpose of a longer-term mortgage would be to lower the monthly payment for homeowners. But a lower monthly payment, has other trade-offs.

cnbc.title: Warren Buffett to step up giving away fortune to his children’s foundations, while supporting successor Abel
cnbc.summary: Buffett, in a Thanksgiving letter, said he needs to accelerate the disbursement of his Berkshire stock to his three children's foundations.

cnbc.title: Disney's newest cruise ship, the Destiny, is getting ready to set sail: Here's a peek inside
cnbc.summary: Like Disney's other cruise ships, the Destiny features themed dining, curated lounges and onboard entertainment. The Destiny is all about heroes and villains.
